text: Kōnō mānuhara bābē saṅgata nahaẏa yē, āllāhē tē'ōm̐ka kitāba, hikamata ārau nubu'ōrata dāna karaāra pichata tē'ōm̐ mānuhaka ka’ba, ‘āllāhara paraibartē tōmālōkē mōraē'i dāsa hai yōraā’, baraṁ tē'ōm̐ ka’ba, ‘tōmālōkē raābbānī hai yōraā, yihētu tōmālōkē kitāba śikṣā diẏā ārau yihētu tōmālōkē adhyaẏana karaā’
